p.s: The extract from scene 3 of Disgraced, Scene 3, by Ayad Akhtar is about the end of an already intense night, that got more intense.
Amir the protagonist and Jory, his colleague from the law-firm left the Apartmentapartment to go and get some champaignchampagne.
Jory storms in and is almost ready to leave again when she sees her husband, Isaac and AmirsAmir's wife, Emily close to kissing.
She just stops and looks at them.
Amir comes in.
He is angry, because Jory just told him that their boss is promoting her and not him.
They all know that Amir was working there longer and that he worked hard for the position that Jory got.
As he gets in, he yells at Jory.
She tells him that she saw Emily and Isaac kiss but the both of them deny it.
Amir just gets angrier because he thinks that Jory destroyed his career and now tries to ruin his and Emily's marriage.
Isaac goes away from Emily and hugs Jory.
But Jory does not want him to hug her so she pushes him away.
While Isaac tries to hug her again he insults Amir.
Amir on the other hand still yells at Jory.
Finally Isaac understands that Jory does not want him to hug her and he leaves.
Jory just stands there for a little while, until Amir kicks her out.
For the first time Emily talks to Amir.
She is shocked about the way Amir kicked Jory out.
After she brought him a coffee, he asks her if she and Isaac had an affair.
She tells Amir about the affair.
The words hit Amir and he loosesloses control.
Emily wants to come close to him but as she does, he starts to hit her.
He hits her multiple times until he realises what he did.
All in all the scene is very intense.
Jory and Amir have a fight but then they find out about their partners having an affair with each other.
Then both of them get even angrier because of that and in the end Jory and Isaac left.
Both in bad moods and Amir hits Emily.
